item.title: [Areillan-RSPS] - Quests - Minigames - 498 - Grand Exchange

item.description:
@EagleRs wrote:

[quote=“mrbad23, post:8, topic:553920”]play now button is broken and the jar from the other link on the forums says cant connect to update server.

Edit: Need java 8 or else client wont work. may want to note that somewhere for da noobs :0[/quote]

I believe problems have been fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Areillan-RSPS] - Quests - Minigames - 498 - Grand Exchange
item.dc:creator: @EagleRs EagleRs
item.description:
@EagleRs wrote:

Updates since posting this thread.

A new voting system giving you amazing perks.
A donator island, with awesome perks - Still in progress.
A quest shop with quest items for the quests that aren’t coded.
A teleporting crystal making your life easier.
Grand-Exchange - Has had items loaded into it, supplying the first economy for the server to get started, this will end on the 30th of December.
Highscores - has been completely reworked, total experience is now the tables total highest, a long with some back end developing to make it smoother.
Drop Rates - The table has been altered, it’s currently set to (x10) it’s original config.
All pages are christmas themed now
Currently working on a new client with awesome add on’s
A twitter and youtube which players can upload videos too.
A very organised forum has been re-worked
(Duel Arena) - It’s currently being developed, it’s way off though.
(Insert all items into Bank) - It’s currently being developed, it’s not far off.

So much more is being added everyday! So come alone and get these benefits.

Read full topic

item.title: [Areillan-RSPS] - Quests - Minigames - 498 - Grand Exchange
item.dc:creator: @EagleRs EagleRs
item.description:
@EagleRs wrote:

briney21:

looks interesting, is this a remake style?

You could say that yes, it’s all about getting all the levels yourself and getting around the game yourself, all items are got from g.e/players or just skilling/killing to gain them, it’s like osrs, but faster, it’s a really fun game, I see your playing, i hope you stick around

Read full topic
